page.title: 09Housing.
page.content: Many of the houses in Biggin were built of{stone}in the last century There are no high flats,but there are many cottages and some bungalows. A substantial proportion of the housing in the village was built by the{council}before and since the war. The latest development is the building of the old people's flats which are made from limestone blocks set in concrete with polystyrene insulation between these and the internal breeze block walls. Some old cottages have been modernized and a barn has been converted to a house. Yew tree Farmhouse and two cottages are listed buildings in the village. There is no gas in Biggin but all houses have mains water and sewage. Many houses have a telephone and most houses have inside toilets.
